name: Pinguin Gun
description: The game is about a penguin called Matt that has an AK 47 and does crazy things to keep the penguin eggs safe from evil penguins : a zombie one, a bandit one, a crazy scientist one and many more enemys. He also becomes a Bowling legend in Antartica. Try not to fail, or else his wife will get mad and send him to jesus, or angry parents will make a protest or something at his house, or he will get punched in the head. The game was made in 1 day by one person. Me. I made the music and art. I made everything.
